full_content: USA heatmap | Devpost Log in Sign up Join a hackathon Devpost Participate in our public hackathons Hackathons Projects Devpost for Teams Access your company's private hackathons Login Host a hackathon Devpost Grow your developer ecosystem and promote your platform Host a public hackathon Devpost for Teams Drive innovation, collaboration, and retention within your organization Host an internal hackathon By use case AI hackathons Customer hackathons Employee hackathons Public hackathons Resources Blog Insights into hackathon planning and participation Customer stories Inspiration from peers and other industry leaders Planning guides Best practices for planning online and in-person hackathons Webinars & events Upcoming events and on-demand recordings Help desk Common questions and support documentation Join a hackathon Devpost Participate in our public hackathons Hackathons Projects Devpost for Teams Access your company's private hackathons Login Host a hackathon Devpost Grow your developer ecosystem and promote your platform Host a public hackathon Devpost for Teams Drive innovation, collaboration, and retention within your organization Host an internal hackathon By use case AI hackathons Customer hackathons Employee hackathons Public hackathons Resources Blog Insights into hackathon planning and participation Customer stories Inspiration from peers and other industry leaders Planning guides Best practices for planning online and in-person hackathons Webinars & events Upcoming events and on-demand recordings Help desk Common questions and support documentation Log in Sign up USA heatmap We attempted to make a web app that uses live data from trusted sources to create a heat map. This heatmap would compare different data, such as poverty, pollution, crime etc. To educate the public Like 1 Comment Story Updates Plotting our air polution data Inspiration Wanting to show data to educate the public What it does Plots raw data regarding things about poverty and pollution How we built it React MongoDB Python Express.js Challenges we ran into Map library was very old, not good documentation Accomplishments that we're proud of Scraping and parsing data from government websties What we learned Al ot about mongo and express and geojson file format What's next for USA heatmap Finding a better library for display our data Built With express.jsmongodbpythonreact Submitted to HackRU Spring 2024 Winner Social Good Track Created by I used python made API calls collecting, cleaning and sending data using Python and the pandas library, and once converting the Json to a GeoJson file I sent it to Mongo DB where Anish created an API to retrieve the data. I also plotted the data using the the google maps API and created a heat map just to see if the data looked accurate. RuthvikAtte Atte I worked on both frontend and backend through React js and Node js, designing the css for the homepage and the API connection to MongoDB. Anish Jha adityasao105 Sao Like 1 1 person likes this: Share this project: Updates adityasao105 Sao started this project — Mar 24, 2024 12:11 PM EDT Leave feedback in the comments!
